item.description:
Somu is hosting this one! Tomorrow should be a gorgeous day for a walk.

Somu's cell number is 240-605-5988 just in case you need it.

Meeting place is Minute Man Visitor Center250 North Great Rd. Rt 2A
Lincoln (I thought, as might you, that this is in Lexington, but it's Lincoln)
Going east bound it's on the left and between Mill St and Marrett Rd both of which are on the right.
Hope this makes sense but there's not really any landmarks.

Enjoy the day!
item.name: Walk at The Minuteman Trail
